Package com.zebra.scannercontrol

Class DCSScannerInfo

java.lang.Object
com.zebra.scannercontrol.DCSScannerInfo
public class DCSScannerInfo extends Object
This class contains information about the scanner like id, Name, Model, Auto Re-Connection Reestablishment etc..

      private boolean autoCommunicationSessionReestablishment
      State of "Automatic communication session reestablishment" option.

    • active

      private boolean active
      State of a particular scanner (i.e. active scanner is a scanner with which a communication session has been already established).

    • scannerName

      private String scannerName
      Name of a particular scanner.

    • isAutoCommunicationSessionReestablishment

      public boolean isAutoCommunicationSessionReestablishment()
      Method to know whether the scanner is configured to support connection reestablishment.
      Returns:
      true if connection reestablishment is enabled(false otherwise)
